  • java.lang.Object

extends DistributedStoreManager
implements KeyColumnValueStoreManager

      • THRIFT_FRAME_SIZE_MB

        public static final String THRIFT_FRAME_SIZE_MB
        THRIFT_FRAME_SIZE_IN_MB should be appropriately set when server-side Thrift counterpart was changed, because otherwise client wouldn't be able to accept read/write frames from server as incorrectly sized. HEADS UP: setting max message size proved itself hazardous to be set on the client, only server needs that kind of protection. Note: property is sized in megabytes for user convenience (defaults are 15MB by cassandra.yaml).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
